value.name: Texas police fatally shoot man who pointed gun at officers
value.description: Amari Malone was being sought as a "person of interest" in an August homicide in the North Texas city when officers found him around 5:45 p.m. Wednesday, according to Interim Police Chief Ed Kraus.

value.name: Police Body Cam Video Of Officer Involved Shooting In East Fort Worth
value.description: The video showed police driving up to the 18-year-old homicide suspect, Amari Malone, saying they wanted to talk to him. That's when Malone pulled a handgun from his waistband and started to run.
